Disabled_Description: Setting to true disables the module
ServerModuleName_Description: Defines name of the module responsible for signup
HashModuleName_Description: Defines hash of the module responsible for signup
CustomLogoUrl_Description: Defines URL of logo image used on signup page
InfoText_Description: Defines additional text message shown on signup page
BottomInfoHtmlText_Description: Defines bottom text message shown on signup page
DomainList_Description: Defines list of domains signup feature is available for
